name: Medusa VS Perseus
description:
-- Gameplay --

It is time to re-enact and reveal the truth behind the fight between Perseus, son of Zeus, and the Gorgon Medusa, known as the stone-snake lady. History books didn't include the heroic fight that Gorgon gave and they portraid her falsely.

Experience the thrill in its true nature ! 

Fight until your last breath !

Whether it is going to be effortless or challenging is up to you.

. -- Controls --

ESC for exiting

You can double jump & double evade. Resets when grounded.

. -- Concept --

Jam Theme : Pumpkin

Limitation : Must include a myth

. -- Used Assets --
